title: James Bond || A Tribute for Daniel Craig
author: Real Scorsese
comment: Well done edit, song choice was also great & unpredicted. Daniel Craig's Bond is going to be missed after this Grand Finale 🤵🏼💥
This is definitely one of the greatest edits I've seen. I hope you will make more Bond edits nonetheless. I will definitely miss Daniel Craig as Bond.

It's a great montage, but man, what is it with that music choice? If this had anything reminiscent of Bond (Bond title song, Bond theme, a piece from a Bond film soundtrack) this would be among my favourite 007 tributes. Don't take it personal, it's just my personal opinion with some constructive criticism. As for the editing - awesome work and good choice of scenes!
heck, I love the choice of music so much, whoever says anything against it! great, I like everything! epic, excellent editing, music breathed like music from the black widow trailer, seriously 😀 🔥🔥🔥
description: A montage fan made video for James Bond with Daniel Craig. So excited for No Time To Die.
